com.hyphenate.chat

Class EMChatManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hyphenate.chat.EMChatManager

  • public class EMChatManager
extends java.lang.Object

    send a message
    EMMessage msg = EMMessage;
    EMClient.getInstance().chatManager().sendMessage(msg);

        public boolean updateParticipant(java.lang.String from,
                                 java.lang.String changeTo)
        update database records, change username 'from' to 'changeTo', take effect on msg table, conversation table, contacts, blacklist table note: this operate will not effect memory data.

        from -
        changeTo -
        Returns:
        operation result, if any update operations on those tables failed, result is false
